alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 5:46PM CDT until September 09 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, or 14 miles south of North Platte, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wellfleet and Hansen Memorial Reserve State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 49 and 72. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
